author: Anonymous Atom
title: check-expect cases
question:
I always have trouble with test coverage for check-expects and cannot figure out the reasoning behind these check expects in the 2021w1-mt1-p4 practice exam in particular.
These are the solution check-expects where you're told to make a function that consumes a LOI and a number and produces the sum of the areas of the images with an area greater than the number.
(check-expect (sum-areas-greater-than empty 10) 0)
(check-expect (sum-areas-greater-than (cons I15x10
                                            (cons I20x30
                                                  empty))
                                      150)
              600)
(check-expect (sum-areas-greater-than (cons I15x10
                                            (cons I20x30
                                                  empty))
                                      151)
              600)
(check-expect (sum-areas-greater-than (cons I15x10
                                            (cons I20x30
                                                  (cons I10x50
                                                        empty)))
                                      500)
              600)
student_answer:
I agree, I would expect to see a test that checks if the sum function is working properly. What is the difference between the second and fourth tests?
Edit: it's a list with 1 more element
